page.title: 14Polebrook House
page.content: Polebrook House used to be a school for naughty boys before it was closed down.When we went there we were met by Mr Jones, the ex-headmaster.First of all we went down the long corridors in the old building.Mr Jones said that the boys used to get down on their hands and knees and scrub the floor.Then we went into the old dining hall.It was very big.I could imagine allthe boys eating their meals in there.Then we went to a room where there was a big bath.When it first opened, the bath used to be filled with cold water from a well.Later on it was heated.The old dormitories were very large and had 45 beds in rows.I did not like them at all. {Helen.
